main_definition: Movers refer to individuals or companies that physically relocate items, typically furniture or household goods from one location to another.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who helps in moving household items during a house move
meanings_and_examples.example: When my family was moving to our new home, we hired movers to transport our furniture.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of physically relocating items from one place to another
meanings_and_examples.example: We needed the services of a professional mover to transport our belongings across the country.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A team or company specializing in moving and packing goods for customers
meanings_and_examples.example: I contacted XYZ Movers, who provided excellent service when we moved into our new apartment.
